channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Certificate System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Certificate System

item.title: CVE-2017-7509|2024-08-05T16:04:11.860Z -- red%20hat -- certificate%20system
item.description: An input validation error was found in Red Hat Certificate System's handling of client provided certificates before 8.1.20-1. If the certreq field is not present in a certificate an assertion error is triggered causing a denial of service.
